Can you provide me with an HTML page that showcases different language families? 
Also, can you include the HTML code for creating a table that displays information about each language family, such as their geographical distribution and number of speakers?

Certainly! Below is an HTML page that showcases different language families, including a table displaying information about each language family, such as their geographical distribution and number of speakers. ```html Language Families of the World

Language Families of the World

Language Family Geographical Distribution Approximate Number of Speakers
Indo-European Europe, Western and Southern Asia, Americas, Australia ~3 billion
Sino-Tibetan East Asia, Southeast Asia ~1.5 billion
Niger-Congo Sub-Saharan Africa ~700 million
Austronesian Southeast Asia, Pacific Islands, Madagascar ~386 million
Afro-Asiatic North Africa, Horn of Africa, Middle East ~495 million
Dravidian Southern India, Northern Sri Lanka ~215 million
Altaic Central Asia, Siberia, Eastern Europe Controversial classification
Uralic Northern Eurasia ~25 million
Austroasiatic Southeast Asia, Eastern India ~117 million
Japanese Japan ~128 million
``` This HTML page includes a table that lists several language families, their geographical distribution, and the approximate number of speakers. You can expand this table with more language families or additional information as needed. Simply save the above code into an `.html` file and open it in a web browser to view the page.
